model.model2048

Class Game2048Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.AbsModel
        • model.model2048.Game2048Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class Game2048Model
extends AbsModel
    2048GameModel Class, responsible for all the game logic. setChanged(): Marks this Observable object as having been changed notifyObservers(): If this object has changed, as indicated by the hasChanged method, then notify all of its observers and then call the clearChanged method to indicate that this object has no longer changed.
